The point

It's almost a little too on-the-nose: A gallery piece where women are permitted entry to view famous pieces of art while being served champagne and otherwise pampered, and men aren't allowed. It would be, anyway, if a man hadn't sued the artist over it. Hear that whooshing sound? If it wasn't actually playing out in Australian courts right now, I'd have speculated he was a plant by the artist.
